definition: first person to be appointed to a post
head/chief/first (occasion, thing etc)/classifier for poems, songs etc
surname Ren/Ren County 任縣|任县[Ren2 Xian4] in Hebei

to assign/to appoint/to take up a post/office/responsibility/to let/to allow/to give free rein to/no matter (how, what etc)/classifier for terms served in office, or for spouses, girlfriends etc (as in 前任男友)

sentences.english: The first U. S. Prisident George Washington is on the dollar bill.

sentences.english: He is seeking to become the first non-European to lead the international lender.
sentences.chinese: 他正尋求成爲首任非歐州的國際貨幣基金組織主席。

sentences.english: In Paris, where he was the first American minister, Franklin became enormously popular.

sentences.english: Administering the borderland was a practical problem faced by liu jin-tang the first provincial governor of xinjiang .
sentences.chinese: 邊疆治理是首任新疆巡撫劉錦棠所面臨的首要問題。
